update IFT_DEMAND
ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PASSENGER_TYPE = #{passengerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEG_TYPE = #{legType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADULT_COUNT = #{adultCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHILD_COUNT = #{childCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INFANT_COUNT = #{infantCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRANSATION_ORDER_NO = #{transationOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

FIRST_AIRLINE = #{firstAirLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DEMAND_NO = #{demandNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update IFT_DEMAND set ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PASSENGER_TYPE = #{passengerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEG_TYPE = #{legType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADULT_COUNT = #{adultCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHILD_COUNT = #{childCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFANT_COUNT = #{infantCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TRANSATION_ORDER_NO = #{transationOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO = #{customerTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_MAIL = #{contactMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCKER = #{locker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERVICE_CLASS = #{serviceClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_AIRLINE = #{firstAirLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DEMAND_NO = #{demandNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT d.DEMAND_NO, d.ID, d.OWNER, d.CUSTOMER_NO, d.PASSENGER_TYPE, d.LEG_TYPE, d.ADULT_COUNT, d.CHILD_COUNT, d.INFANT_COUNT, d.CONTACT_NAME, d.CONTACT_PHONE, d.REMARK, d.STATUS, d.AUDITOR, d.AUDIT_TIME, d.TRANSATION_ORDER_NO, d.VALID, d.MODIFIER, d.MODIFY_TIME, d.CREATE_TIME, d.CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO, d.CONTACT_MAIL, d.CREATOR,LOCKER,d.SERVICE_CLASS, d.FIRST_AIRLINE,d.IS_TEAM,d.TEAM_NO from IFT_DEMAND d left join IFT_DEMAND_DETAIL dd on d.DEMAND_NO = dd.DEMAND_NO WHERE
d.VALID = 1 AND
d.DEMAND_NO = #{demandNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
d.IS_TEAM = #{isTeam,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
DATE_FORMAT(d.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d') AND
DATE_FORMAT(d.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d') AND
DATE_FORMAT(dd.DEP_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{flightStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d') AND
DATE_FORMAT(dd.DEP_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{flightEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d') AND
dd.DEP_AIRPORT = #{depAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
dd.ARR_AIRPORT = #{arrAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
d.CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO = #{customerTypeNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
d. CONTACT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ) AND
d.LEG_TYPE = #{legType,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND
d.STATUS in
#{statusArray[${index}]}
AND
d.CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
d.OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
(d.LOCKER = 0) AND d.LOCKER != 0 AND d.LOCKER = #{locker,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND
d.CUSTOMER_NO = #{customerNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND
d.PASSENGER_TYPE = #{passengerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
d.TRANSATION_ORDER_NO = #{transationOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND
order by d.CREATE_TIME desc
